verbose_text: Thapsigargin, an irreversible inhibitor of the sarco / endoplasmic reticulum calcium ATPase (SERCA) that prevents reabsorption of calcium into the ER resulting in a strong cell stress response, robustly enhanced the generation of Th17 cells (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: ATPase (SERCA) that prevents reabsorption of calcium
